byline.contributor: Kate Pastor and John Surico contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By AL BAKER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

abstract: New York City police say they are seeking Joseph Danclair in connection with deaths of Chrissy Bevelaqua and Antoinette Marin, who were found in Brooklyn and Manhattan hotels, respectively; cause of deaths has not been determined, but there is evidence deaths are related and both women are believed to have spent time with Danclair.
lead_paragraph: Officials have released video images of Joseph Danclair, 36, who is believed to have spent time with women who were found dead in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and Midtown Manhattan.

headline.main: Brooklyn Man Sought in Similar Deaths of 2 Women at Hotels
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Man Is Sought in Two Deaths at Hotels

snippet: Officials have released video images of Joseph Danclair, 36, who is believed to have spent time with women who were found dead in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, and Midtown Manhattan.
